Html:
Hi, I downloaded the files (project) Ribbon on your site, from here but it is that I find the reference to create an application or something Ribbon, can not find in the downloaded folder and I need to get that reference. "Dll so that can add to the references of my project with Visual Studio.
I read the tutorial "http://blogs.microsoft.co.il/blogs/arik/archive/2009/09/15/windows-ribbon-for-winforms-part-3-first-winforms-ribbon-application.aspx" and not get anything.

The download consists of 18 samples (exe projects) and a single Dll project (Ribbon.dll)
All you need to do is compile the solution and get the output of the ribbon dll project.

If you are unable to compile the project, maybe you can post the exact error message.
Please review the other discussions since a few errors are known, for example:
- compiling under 64bit version.
- make sure you have Widows 7 SDK installed.

You can download a compiled version of the Ribbon.dll here: http://www.codeproject.com/KB/shell/windowsribbon02.aspx
under "Download demo project"
